INSERT INTO coupon( coupon_no, branch_no, admin_no, coupon_name, coupon_discount, coupon_category, coupon_start, coupon_finish, group_no ) VALUES ( coupon_seq.nextval, #{branch_no}, #{admin_no}, #{coupon_name}, #{coupon_discount}, '지점', #{coupon_start}, #{coupon_finish}, #{group_no} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.*, b.BRANCH_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.group_no ORDER BY c.branch_no DESC) AS RankNo FROM coupon c INNER JOIN BRANCH b ON c.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO WHERE
c.branch_no = #{branch_no}
c.COUPON_CATEGORY = '전체'
AND to_Date(c.COUPON_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND to_Date(c.COUPON_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_Date(c.COUPON_FINISH , 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND to_Date(c.COUPON_START, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_Date(c.COUPON_FINISH , 'yyyy-mm-dd') < to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
) T WHERE RankNo = 1
